titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to a supplicatorie epistle, of G.T. for the pretended Catholiques written to the right Honorable Lords of her Maiesties priuy Councell. By VVater [sic] Trauers, minister of the worde of God.
titleStmt.author: Travers, Walter, 1547 or 8-1635.

titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to a supplicatorie epistle, of G.T. for the pretended Catholiques written to the right Honorable Lords of her Maiesties priuy Councell. By VVater [sic] Trauers, minister of the worde of God.
titleStmt.author: Travers, Walter, 1547 or 8-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Wolfe, Robert Waldegrave, and others?] for Tobie Smith, dwelling in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: A response to the first part of: Parsons, Robert. An epistle of the persecution of Catholickes in England.
"Wolfe pr[inted]. quires A-G; K, R, T, U, Aa are signed in Waldegrave's manner. Other pr[inter]s. or compositors are responsible for the tp, H, I; M-O; L, P, Q, S, X-Z, Bb, Cc"--STC.
Running title reads: An answere to a popish treatise vvritten to the LL. of the Councell.
With three final errata leaves; the last leaf is blank.
Identified as STC 24182 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
